channel.title: Community on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Community on LiaScript

item.title: LiaScript - WorldMap
item.description: This idea was motivated by the OER-World Map in order to to visualize the distribution of educational content that was created with LiaScript.

item.title: Liascript User Symposium (Recording)
item.description: Discover WHO is utilizing and creating free, open online courses using the user-friendly LiaScript Markdown and WHY.

item.title: Offene Bildungsmaterialien auf twillo finden und teilen
item.description: Twillo ist ein Portal, das sich auf offene Bildungsmaterialien (OER) spezialisiert hat, insbesondere im Bereich der Hochschullehre.

item.title: Promoting your Content
item.description: If you want to “promote” the LiaScript content you have created, or share it with a wider audience, then you can use the following methods.
